title: Mumak (5C73)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Raider
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Possession • Mount
Strength:	+3
Game Text:	Bearer must be a Southron. Bearer is fierce. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may add (2).
Lore:	“Sam saw a vast shape crash out of the trees and come careening down the slope.”
Rarity:	C
